channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-5161] Additional SerDe support for varchar type
item.description: Breaking out support for varchar for the various SerDes as an additional task.
item.summary: Additional SerDe support for varchar type

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
